title: Sugarfoot
occurrences: Regular sugarfoot, ain't he? Sugarfoot Jack.
Meet Sugarfoot Jack, just got in from the east today.
Morning, Mr Sugarfoot. - Good morning.
You... Mr Sugarfoot, you really not know me yet.
Lots of business we will do together, Mr Sugarfoot, you and me.
Is Mr Crane in? - Sure, Sugarfoot.
Hey, JC! Sugarfoot's cravin' to see you.
You will use your judgment, Sugarfoot.
Sugarfoot... Honour, that's a thing.
Now you go, Sugarfoot. You make me a good dicker.
A good friend to Mr Sugarfoot, are you not?
I am looking forward to our further acquaintance, Mr Sugarfoot.
Not in here, Sugarfoot!
I'm Judge Backus. You making any charges against this man, Sugarfoot?
You are very lucky, Mr Sugarfoot.
But I think, Mr Sugarfoot, you are the man that bullets look for.
God bless you, Sugarfoot.
So just soothe yourself down, Sugarfoot.
Sugarfoot, you've done your part.
Sugarfoot caught his meat. He has the right to cook it how he wants.
Sugarfoot! - Hmm? - Sugarfoot!!
Oh, you're stubborn, Sugarfoot.
Sugarfoot, it isn't easy for a man to get ahead

Sugarfoot starts on a trip today that'll be sufficiently dangerous in itself.
Because if Sugarfoot does not come back safely,

Oh, you are stubborn, Sugarfoot. You're relentless.

Listen, you, Sugarfoot.
Sugarfoot!
